titlestmt.titleproper: Bohn (Ronald) Collection of Film and Television Music Sound Recordings
Finding Aid for the Ronald Bohn Collection of Film and Television Music Sound Recordings PASC-M.0105
titlestmt.author: Processed by UCLA Library Special Collections.

address.addressline: Room A1713, Charles E. Young Research Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-10-05 13:58:11 -0700.

did.unittitle: Ronald Bohn collection of film and television music sound recordings
did.abstract: The collection consists of commercially issued and other sound recordings, of music for television shows and motion pictures. The collection is in the midst of being processed. The finding aid will be updated periodically.
did.physloc: Stored off-site. All requests to access special collections material must be made in advance using the request button located on this page.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. All requests to access special collections materials must be made in advance using the request button located on this page.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Reproduction and Use
userestrict.p: Property rights to the physical objects belong to UCLA Library Special Collections. All other rights, including copyright, are retained by the creators and their heirs. It is the responsibility of the researcher to determine who holds the copyright and pursue the copyright owner or his or her heir for permission to publish where The UC Regents do not hold the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Ronald Bohn Collection of Film and Television Music Sound Recordings (Collection PASC-M 105). UCLA Library Special Collections, Charles E. Young Research Library, University of California, Los Angeles.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by UCLA Library, Performing Arts Special Collections

Collections are processed to a variety of levels depending on the work necessary to make them usable, their perceived user interest and research value, availability of staff and resources, and competing priorities. Library Special Collections provides a standard level of preservation and access for all collections and, when time and resources permit, conducts more intensive processing. These materials have been arranged and described according to national and local standards and best practices.

We are committed to providing ethical, inclusive, and anti-racist description of the materials we steward, and to remediating existing description of our materials that contains language that may be offensive or cause harm. We invite you to submit feedback about how our collections are described, and how they could be described more accurately, by filling out the form located on our website: Report Potentially Offensive Description in Library Special Collections.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of commercially-issued and other sound recordings, on 12 in. LP phonodiscs, of music for television shows and motion pictures.
The collection is arranged alphabetically by album title.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Ghostbusters -- Against All Odds (Take a Look at Me Now) -- Theme from Ice Castles (Through the Eyes of Love) -- The Greatest Love of All -- St. Elmo's Fire (Man in Motion) -- My Male Curiosity -- Freedom -- People Up in Texas -- It Might Be You (Theme from Tootsie) -- Electro-Phantasma -- Theme from Midnight Express -- (Closest Thing to) Perfect -- Savin' the Day -- Love Theme from St. Elmo's Fire -- Love Makes You Blind --Showdown -- Theme from Close Encounters of the Third Kind -- The Moment of Truth -- (It Takes Two)To Tango -- Separate Lives (Love theme from White Nights) -- Tap Dance -- Quicksilver Lightening -- One Day -- A Fine Mess -- Walk Through the Fire -- Prove Me Wrong -- One Love -- Cleanin' Up the Town -- Out of Bounds -- Fun Away -- Long as We Believe -- Working Girl March -- Love Theme from The Competition.
